oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mechanical Engineering Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Students; Engineering; Classrooms; Laboratories
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The beginnings of CBC's mechanical engineering program started in the academic year 1955-1956. The Bachelor of Science degree was added to CBC's curriculum in 1956-1957.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
